plot: On the eve of leaving New York, Ben calls beautiful but messed-up ex wife Marlena to say goodbye. The ensuing conversation leads to one last meeting that has a devastating and unforeseeable emotional impact.
title: Whales
plot_es: On the eve of leaving New York, Ben calls beautiful but messed-up ex wife Marlena to say goodbye. The ensuing conversation leads to one last meeting that has a devastating and unforeseeable emotional impact.
plot_en: On the eve of leaving New York, Ben calls beautiful but messed-up ex wife Marlena to say goodbye. The ensuing conversation leads to one last meeting that has a devastating and unforeseeable emotional impact.
